CustomField.description: First installment based on billing frequency and prorated total; one-off charges fully due in first payment
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(First_Payment_Due_Override__c), CASE( TEXT(Billing_Frequency__c), "Monthly", (Annual_Total__c / 12) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Quarterly", (Annual_Total__c / 4) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Semi-Annual", (Annual_Total__c / 2) + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "Annually", Annual_Total__c + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c), "One-time", Total_Payment_Due__c, Annual_Total__c + IF(ISNULL(One_Off_Charges__c), 0, One_Off_Charges__c) ), First_Payment_Due_Override__c)
CustomField.label: First Payment Due
